subject: Murders and Attempted Murders
Football
Widows and Widowers
lead_paragraph: The widow of the former N.F.L. quarterback Steve McNair persuaded a Nashville judge to put more than $1 million from McNair’s estate into trusts for the couple’s two sons.
snippet: The widow of the former N.F.L. quarterback Steve McNair persuaded a Nashville judge to put more than $1 million from McNair’s estate into trusts for the couple’s two sons.
